bug.author: mosynaq
bug.description:
I have my brown cluster, frequency, and word vectors. When I issue the following $ python3 -m spacy init-model fa output freqs --vectors-loc fa_wiki.word2vec I get this: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/lib/python3.5/runpy.py", line 184, in _run_module_as_main "__main__", mod_spec) File "/usr/lib/python3.5/runpy.py", line 85, in _run_code exec(code, run_globals) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/spacy/__main__.py", line 31, in <module> plac.call(commands[command]) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/plac_core.py", line 324, in call parser = parser_from(obj) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/plac_core.py", line 133, in parser_from parser.populate_from(obj) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/plac_core.py", line 257, in populate_from a = Annotation.from_(ann) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/plac_core.py", line 91, in from_ return cls(*obj) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/plac_core.py", line 78, in __init__ assert abbrev is None, abbrev AssertionError: f <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Platform: Linux-4.11.0-14-generic-x86_64-with-LinuxMint-18.3-sylvia Models: en, es spaCy version: 2.0.5 Python version: 3.5.2

comments.comment: Thanks and sorry about that. This has already been fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/pull/1789>#1789</denchmark-link> and will be included in the next release!
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
